enterInvite: Enter your invitation code. If you do not have one, ask someone in the Celo Community to invite you. By joining this application, you agree to share your name & phone number with us. Learn more at celo.org
alreadyHaveWallet: Already have a Celo Wallet? Restore it

restoreYourWallet.title: Restore your Celo Wallet
restoreYourWallet.description: Already have a Celo Wallet? Please enter your Backup Key to restore it to this phone.
restoreYourWallet.socialDescription: When you safeguarded your Backup Key, you sent recovery secrets to two friends to allow your key to be recovered. Paste the recovery secrets here (in any order) to regain access to your funds.

backupKeyTip: Backup Keys are 24 words long, separated by a space.  If you have a Backup Key created outside the Celo Wallet, you may enter also enter it here.
socialBackupKeyTip: Secret phrases are lists of 13 words separated by spaces.
